IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_member') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_member GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_member @character_id dbo.id_t, @guild_id dbo.id_t, @grade TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO Guild_Members(character_id, guild_id, grade) VALUES(@character_id, @guild_id, @grade) SET NOCOUNT OFF
